img_summary: The image depicts a set of seeds displayed on an ornate tray, likely representing a rare medicinal ingredient within the context of the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, it is part of a series showcasing collectible seeds, such as Fire Date Seeds and Millennium Ginseng Seeds, which are obtained through specific in-game actions like defeating enemies or gathering resources. This particular seed may represent another rare item with unique properties or uses in the game's narrative or mechanics.
